posts.post_content:
I have recently upgraded some cards. I have the following cards for sale. I got a few inquiries so cards are now for sale as singles.  Taking Best Offers on singles or will do lot of last 5 for $65 delivered/with confirmation... I perfer paypal gift/money owed, but will take money order or check. 

Please feel free to make offers on cards/lot

1910 Obaks
All 175 Subjects

Browning, San Fran -SOLD
Carroll, Oakland - Paper Loss - SOLD
Cartwright, Spokane - Poor because of small sealed pin holes - Card looks G/VG 
Rapps, Portland - Poor - Hole Punch in top 
Rapps, Portland - Poor Hole in face 
Seaton - Portland - Fair - Creases some chipping 

1911 Obaks

Barry, Portland - SOLD
Kippert - P/F - Nice Front- Back paper loss 

If anyone needs better scans please feel free to ask.
